LH4:=SUM(IF(C1>=(HI/POW(GZ,4)) AND C1<(HI/POW(GZ,3)),V,0),DA); LH5:=SUM(IF(C1>=(HI/POW(GZ,5)) AND C1<(HI/POW(GZ,4)),V,0),DA); LH6:=SUM(IF(C1>=(HI/POW(GZ,6)) AND C1<(HI/POW(GZ,5)),V,0),DA); LH7:=SUM(IF(C1>=(HI/POW(GZ,7)) AND C1<(HI/POW(GZ,6)),V,0),DA); L2:=REFDATE(HHV(LH2,DA),DATE),LINETHICK0; L3:=REFDATE(HHV(LH3,DA),DATE),LINETHICK0; L4:=REFDATE(HHV(LH4,DA),DATE); L5:=REFDATE(HHV(LH5,DA),DATE); L6:=REFDATE(HHV(LH6,DA),DATE); L7:=REFDATE(HHV(LH7,DA),DATE); L8:=REFDATE(HHV(LH8,DA),DATE); L9:=REFDATE(HHV(LH9,DA),DATE); L10:=REFDATE(HHV(LH10,DA),DATE); SS:=(L1+L2+L3+L4+L5+L6+L7+L8+L9+L10); STICKLINE(CEILING(DA*L1/SS)*3>=CURRBARSCOUNT,HI*99/100,HI/GZ,9,0)COLOR3C3C3A,LINETHICK3; STICKLINE(CEILING(DA*L6/SS)*3>=CURRBARSCOUNT,HI/POW(GZ,5)*99/100,HI/POW(GZ,6),9,0)COLOR3C3C3A,LINETHICK3; STICKLINE(CEILING(DA*L7/SS)*3>=CURRBARSCOUNT,HI/POW(GZ,6)*99/100,HI/POW(GZ,7),9,0)COLOR3C3C3A,LINETHICK3; STICKLINE(CEILING(DA*L8/SS)*3>=CURRBARSCOUNT,LO*POW(GZ,2),LO*POW(GZ,3)*99/100,9,0)COLOR3C3C3A,LINETHICK3; STICKLINE(CEILING(DA*L9/SS)*3>=CURRBARSCOUNT,LO*POW(GZ,1),LO*POW(GZ,2)*99/100,9,0)COLOR3C3C3A,LINETHICK3;
